overview: Anbessa, an Eritrean refugee is deported from Israel. He manages to escape the immigration police at the airport straight into the hands of Netanya›s soccer fans that mistake him to be the new Nigerian striker supposed to land that day. Now, Anbessa›s Sght for survival and the team›s Sght against relegation unite. the problem is, he never played soccer. Will Anbessa›s new status help him get his freedom?
tagline: All my life I run There are people who were born to run who have no choice when you run you do not think do not feel and at a certain point also the pain disappears the problems begin precisely when you stop.
title: running on sand
